TopicTitle: Please tell me where to install files marked 'resources' or 'source' ??

Articles.Content:
Please tell me where to install files marked 'resources' or 'source' ?? I have been having a lot of trouble installing electrical energy because of the resource files that I have no idea what to do with.

or can someone please tell me how to install electrical energy and I will be quite happy!
Resources go in the "resources" file in the Ksp directory and you dont put the source anywhere unless you mod or want to develop for the mod.
resource files go to the resource folder in the KSP main folder. source you don't need, they're for people looking to mod the mod
except I don't see a resources folder in the kip folder.. hmm..

You're just supposed to jam it in there, as said folder isn't needed for vanilla.

Edit:Never mind, I need to do more research before I post.

Edited August 22, 2012 by robly18
Have you got the full or the demo version?
Full version, but I just made new folder, called it resources and stuck it in there. Seems to have done the trick.
